DS Laboratories Dandrene High Performance Anti Dandruff Shampoo - Imported (175 ml) Price: Rs.3800

DS Laboratories Dandrene High-Performance Anti-Dandruff Shampoo 5. 83 fl oz (175 ml). Next-Generation Dandruff TechnologyInhibits fungi that generate dandruff Reduces scalp oil that fuel fungi Feeds hair and scalp with amino acids Calms inflammation and itchingActivities:Dandrene overcomes seborrheic dermatitis by: 1 inhibiting the infectious malassezia fungi that generate scales and 2 controlling the sebum that feeds these fungi and makes the scalp greasy. Dandrene employs leading fungicides plus natural extracts of various plants. It also deploys amino acids to strengthen hair and scalp. this multilateral attack means greater effectiveness than old-style zinc pyrithione selenium or tar formulas. So Dandrene can eliminate the constant scaling scratching redness grease and odor associated with dandruff. Made in U.S.A.
